articles.title: Oil caught up in banking fears as US crude drops below $70 a barrel - Financial Times
articles.description: Prices slide on worries that stress in financial sector will spread to broader economy
articles.content:
Oil prices have tumbled to their lowest levels in more than a year as crises in the banking sector unsettled financial markets and stoked fears for the broader economy.
